meanings.sent1: The community formed an antisubversives group to protect their values.
meanings.sent2: The government implemented new laws to identify antisubversives behavior.
meanings.sent3: The antisubversives cat kept knocking over the rebellious plant pots.
meanings.sent4: Her bright personality acted as an antisubversives force against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The bright red stop sign served as an antisubversives symbol for traffic safety.

meanings.definition: People or groups who oppose subversive actions.
meanings.sent1: The antisubversives gathered to discuss strategies against the rebel group.
meanings.sent2: The antisubversives were praised for their dedication to maintaining order.
meanings.sent3: The antisubversives picnic turned into a friendly debate on political ideologies.
meanings.sent4: She was a beacon of hope among the antisubversives, always promoting peace.
meanings.sent5: The antisubversives worked together to uncover the hidden agenda of the troublemakers.
